resources.string: "First you need to take a picture of the sudoku grid by touching the screen when ready." "After that, you'll need to touch the screen a second time to process the grid and solve it." "Once solved the result will automatically be drawn on the camera frame."

"Note that this app use image processing method to process grid. That means, better is your" "image more the processing will succeed. You'll certainly have to try and try again" "according to the quality of your images."

"First you need to take a picture of the sudoku grid by touching the screen when ready." "After that, you'll need to touch the screen a second time to process the grid and solve it." "Once solved the result will automatically be drawn on the camera frame\n" "Note that this app use image processing method to process grid. That means, better is your" "image more the processing will succeed!You\'ll certainly have to try and try again" "according to the quality of your images"
